studySpaces.name: Green Room Cafe
studySpaces.description: The Green Room proudly serves Java City ecoGrounds beverages, an assortment of tasty pastries and a number of hearty and healthy food options, such as sandwiches and wraps. You can even use your FlexDine here!

studySpaces.name: Phoenix Food Court
studySpaces.description: Phoenix Food Court offers a variety of food options! Enjoy a meal while you study!

studySpaces.name: Engineering Tower
studySpaces.description: Engineering Tower has extra facilities for engineering students.

studySpaces.description: Enjoy the sun outside while you study!

studySpaces.name: Information and Computer Science I
studySpaces.description: Lots of whiteboards can be found in the study rooms here!

studySpaces.name: Java City
studySpaces.description: Enjoy fresh coffee while you study at Java City! You can even use your FlexDine here!

studySpaces.name: Donald Bren Hall
studySpaces.description: Donald Bren hall is renowned for its thoughtfully designed and versatile study spaces, providing an ideal environment for academic pursuits. The hall boasts a variety of study areas that cater to different preferences and learning styles.

studySpaces.name: Overhang
studySpaces.description: This shaded study area can be found outside the front entrance of Rowland Hall.

studySpaces.name: Croul Hall
studySpaces.description: A study spot likely close to many of your science classes!

studySpaces.name: Interdisciplinary Science & Engineering Building
studySpaces.description: Check out Garbanzo Mediterranean Fresh & Peet's Coffee as you study!

studySpaces.name: Starbucks
studySpaces.description: Get something to eat or drink while you study!

studySpaces.name: Schneiderman Hall
studySpaces.description: Shaded by trees, the tables that can be found outside Schneiderman Hall are a relaxing outside space to get your studying done.

studySpaces.name: Anteater Learning Pavilion
studySpaces.description: The colosseum of studying. Many study rooms and areas can be found at ALP!

studySpaces.name: Humanities Gateway
studySpaces.description: Enjoy the sun outside while you study!
